test_scenarios.name: Homepage Load and Basic Search
steps: Verify page loads successfully and Walmart logo is visible
Enter a valid search term (e.g., 'laptop') in the search bar
Click the search icon or press Enter
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page displays with relevant products.

test_scenarios.name: Add Item to Cart and Proceed to Checkout
steps: Select a product from the search results
Verify the product detail page loads correctly
View cart by clicking the 'View Cart' button (or navigating to the cart page)
test_scenarios.expected_result: Checkout page loads successfully, prompting for login or guest checkout.
